actions.committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To amend the Job Training Partnership Act to provide for employment and training assistance for certain individuals employed at a facility at which the employer has made a public announcement that a substantial number of employees will be terminated or laid off from employment.

summary.text: Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to provide for employment and training assistance for certain individuals employed at a facility at which the employer has made a public announcement that a substantial number of employees will be terminated or laid off from employment.

titles.title: To amend the Job Training Partnership Act to provide for employment and training assistance for certain individuals employed at a facility at which the employer has made a public announcement that a substantial number of employees will be terminated or laid off from employment.
